ChIDE is an integrated development environment for Chrome. 

NOT! It's a work in progress, so right now it's just a text editor. An able one, I hope. 

I do intend to roll out relevant IDE features as I come up with them, including a local server and integration with Git ASAP.

Bug reports: https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topic/chide/IYaQ528kzjk
Feature requests: https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topic/chide/mwttn6XDwN4
